title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at The Christian and Missionary Alliance
Interview Descriptions:
3 rounds of interviews and an assessment.  

- 1st with the agency
- 2nd with a panel of 3
- Assessment after the 2nd stage.  Write a letter and book flights based on a travel scenario
- 3rd with a panel of 5

Not a good candidate experience.
Interview Questions: Are you comfortable staying on Wednesdays for prayer meetings?

title: Customer Care Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at The Christian and Missionary Alliance (Colorado Springs, CO) in Nov 2015
Interview Descriptions: Overall, semi-informal. I submitted my application online. I was then emailed with an interview request. I met with the director and VP for my position and was hired within a week.
Interview Questions: How do you ensure you meet deadlines?

title: CIO Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at The Christian and Missionary Alliance (Colorado Springs, CO) in Dec 2012
Interview Descriptions: Great interview. 5 stage interview cordial, intellectual, friendly. Staged well. Was an interactive process and helpful. The interview was also done in conjunction with a consulting firm. Consulting firm did the first screening before recommending to HR. HR interview led to one on one with immediate supervisor. After that a group panel of three groups face off with a presentation.
